vernac_cmds: Require Import ZAxioms ZMulOrder ZSgnAbs NZDiv.
Module Type ZDivProp (Import A : ZAxiomsSig') (Import B : ZMulOrderProp A) (Import C : ZSgnAbsProp A B).
Module Import Private_NZDiv := Nop <+ NZDivProp A A B.
Lemma mod_eq : forall a b, b~=0 -> a mod b == a - b*(a/b).
Lemma mod_bound_abs : forall a b, b~=0 -> abs (a mod b) < abs b.
Theorem div_mod_unique : forall b q1 q2 r1 r2 : t, (0<=r1<b \/ b<r1<=0) -> (0<=r2<b \/ b<r2<=0) -> b*q1+r1 == b*q2+r2 -> q1 == q2 /\ r1 == r2.
intros b q1 q2 r1 r2 Hr1 Hr2 EQ.
destruct Hr1; destruct Hr2; try (intuition; order).
Theorem div_unique: forall a b q r, (0<=r<b \/ b<r<=0) -> a == b*q + r -> q == a/b.
intros a b q r Hr EQ.
assert (Hb : b~=0) by (destruct Hr; intuition; order).
destruct (div_mod_unique b q (a/b) r (a mod b)); trivial.
destruct Hr; [left; apply mod_pos_bound|right; apply mod_neg_bound]; intuition order.
Theorem div_unique_pos: forall a b q r, 0<=r<b -> a == b*q + r -> q == a/b.
intros; apply div_unique with r; auto.
Theorem div_unique_neg: forall a b q r, b<r<=0 -> a == b*q + r -> q == a/b.
intros; apply div_unique with r; auto.
Theorem mod_unique: forall a b q r, (0<=r<b \/ b<r<=0) -> a == b*q + r -> r == a mod b.
intros a b q r Hr EQ.
assert (Hb : b~=0) by (destruct Hr; intuition; order).
destruct (div_mod_unique b q (a/b) r (a mod b)); trivial.
destruct Hr; [left; apply mod_pos_bound|right; apply mod_neg_bound]; intuition order.
Theorem mod_unique_pos: forall a b q r, 0<=r<b -> a == b*q + r -> r == a mod b.
intros; apply mod_unique with q; auto.
Theorem mod_unique_neg: forall a b q r, b<r<=0 -> a == b*q + r -> r == a mod b.
intros; apply mod_unique with q; auto.
Ltac pos_or_neg a := let LT := fresh "LT" in let LE := fresh "LE" in destruct (le_gt_cases 0 a) as [LE|LT]; [|rewrite <- opp_pos_neg in LT].
Fact mod_bound_or : forall a b, b~=0 -> 0<=a mod b<b \/ b<a mod b<=0.
Fact opp_mod_bound_or : forall a b, b~=0 -> 0 <= -(a mod b) < -b \/ -b < -(a mod b) <= 0.
Lemma div_opp_opp : forall a b, b~=0 -> -a/-b == a/b.
Lemma mod_opp_opp : forall a b, b~=0 -> (-a) mod (-b) == - (a mod b).
Lemma div_opp_l_z : forall a b, b~=0 -> a mod b == 0 -> (-a)/b == -(a/b).
Lemma div_opp_l_nz : forall a b, b~=0 -> a mod b ~= 0 -> (-a)/b == -(a/b)-1.
apply div_unique with (b - a mod b).
Lemma mod_opp_l_z : forall a b, b~=0 -> a mod b == 0 -> (-a) mod b == 0.
Lemma mod_opp_l_nz : forall a b, b~=0 -> a mod b ~= 0 -> (-a) mod b == b - a mod b.
Lemma div_opp_r_z : forall a b, b~=0 -> a mod b == 0 -> a/(-b) == -(a/b).
Lemma div_opp_r_nz : forall a b, b~=0 -> a mod b ~= 0 -> a/(-b) == -(a/b)-1.
Lemma mod_opp_r_z : forall a b, b~=0 -> a mod b == 0 -> a mod (-b) == 0.
Lemma mod_opp_r_nz : forall a b, b~=0 -> a mod b ~= 0 -> a mod (-b) == (a mod b) - b.
Lemma mod_sign_nz : forall a b, b~=0 -> a mod b ~= 0 -> sgn (a mod b) == sgn b.
Lemma mod_sign : forall a b, b~=0 -> sgn (a mod b) ~= -sgn b.
now rewrite <- H, opp_0, EQ, sgn_0.
Lemma mod_sign_mul : forall a b, b~=0 -> 0 <= (a mod b) * b.
apply mul_nonneg_nonneg; destruct (mod_pos_bound a b); order.
apply mul_nonpos_nonpos; destruct (mod_neg_bound a b); order.
Lemma div_same : forall a, a~=0 -> a/a == 1.
Lemma mod_same : forall a, a~=0 -> a mod a == 0.
Theorem div_small: forall a b, 0<=a<b -> a/b == 0.
Theorem mod_small: forall a b, 0<=a<b -> a mod b == a.
Lemma mod_0_l: forall a, a~=0 -> 0 mod a == 0.
intros; rewrite mod_eq, div_0_l; now nzsimpl.
Lemma div_1_r: forall a, a/1 == a.
Lemma mod_1_r: forall a, a mod 1 == 0.
rewrite mod_eq, div_1_r; nzsimpl; auto using sub_diag.
intro EQ; symmetry in EQ; revert EQ; apply lt_neq; apply lt_0_1.
Lemma mod_1_l: forall a, 1<a -> 1 mod a == 1.
Lemma div_mul : forall a b, b~=0 -> (a*b)/b == a.
Lemma mod_mul : forall a b, b~=0 -> (a*b) mod b == 0.
Theorem div_unique_exact a b q: b~=0 -> a == b*q -> q == a/b.
Theorem mod_le: forall a b, 0<=a -> 0<b -> a mod b <= a.
Theorem div_pos : forall a b, 0<=a -> 0<b -> 0<= a/b.
Lemma div_str_pos : forall a b, 0<b<=a -> 0 < a/b.
Lemma div_small_iff : forall a b, b~=0 -> (a/b==0 <-> 0<=a<b \/ b<a<=0).
rewrite (div_mod a b Hb), EQ; nzsimpl.
Lemma mod_small_iff : forall a b, b~=0 -> (a mod b == a <-> 0<=a<b \/ b<a<=0).
Lemma div_lt : forall a b, 0<a -> 1<b -> a/b < a.
Lemma div_le_mono : forall a b c, 0<c -> a<=b -> a/c <= b/c.
intros a b c Hc Hab.
rewrite (div_mod b c) at 1 by order.
Lemma mul_div_le : forall a b, 0<b -> b*(a/b) <= a.
rewrite (div_mod a b) at 2; try order.
Lemma mul_div_ge : forall a b, b<0 -> a <= b*(a/b).
Lemma mul_succ_div_gt: forall a b, 0<b -> a < b*(S (a/b)).
rewrite (div_mod a b) at 1; try order.
Lemma mul_succ_div_lt: forall a b, b<0 -> b*(S (a/b)) < a.
Lemma div_exact : forall a b, b~=0 -> (a == b*(a/b) <-> a mod b == 0).
rewrite (div_mod a b) at 1; try order.
Theorem div_lt_upper_bound: forall a b q, 0<b -> a < b*q -> a/b < q.
Theorem div_le_upper_bound: forall a b q, 0<b -> a <= b*q -> a/b <= q.
Theorem div_le_lower_bound: forall a b q, 0<b -> b*q <= a -> q <= a/b.
Lemma div_le_compat_l: forall p q r, 0<=p -> 0<q<=r -> p/r <= p/q.
Lemma mod_add : forall a b c, c~=0 -> (a + b * c) mod c == a mod c.
rewrite mul_add_distr_l, add_shuffle0, <- div_mod by order.
Lemma div_add : forall a b c, c~=0 -> (a + b * c) / c == a / c + b.
rewrite mul_add_distr_l, add_shuffle0, <- div_mod by order.
Lemma div_add_l: forall a b c, b~=0 -> (a * b + c) / b == a + c / b.
Lemma div_mul_cancel_r : forall a b c, b~=0 -> c~=0 -> (a*c)/(b*c) == a/b.
rewrite (div_mod a b) at 1 by order.
Lemma div_mul_cancel_l : forall a b c, b~=0 -> c~=0 -> (c*a)/(c*b) == a/b.
Lemma mul_mod_distr_l: forall a b c, b~=0 -> c~=0 -> (c*a) mod (c*b) == c * (a mod b).
rewrite <- mul_assoc, <- mul_add_distr_l, mul_cancel_l by order.
Lemma mul_mod_distr_r: forall a b c, b~=0 -> c~=0 -> (a*c) mod (b*c) == (a mod b) * c.
Theorem mod_mod: forall a n, n~=0 -> (a mod n) mod n == a mod n.
Lemma mul_mod_idemp_l : forall a b n, n~=0 -> ((a mod n)*b) mod n == (a*b) mod n.
rewrite (div_mod a n) at 1 by order.
Lemma mul_mod_idemp_r : forall a b n, n~=0 -> (a*(b mod n)) mod n == (a*b) mod n.
Theorem mul_mod: forall a b n, n~=0 -> (a * b) mod n == ((a mod n) * (b mod n)) mod n.
Lemma add_mod_idemp_l : forall a b n, n~=0 -> ((a mod n)+b) mod n == (a+b) mod n.
rewrite (div_mod a n) at 1 by order.
Lemma add_mod_idemp_r : forall a b n, n~=0 -> (a+(b mod n)) mod n == (a+b) mod n.
Theorem add_mod: forall a b n, n~=0 -> (a+b) mod n == (a mod n + b mod n) mod n.
Lemma div_div : forall a b c, b~=0 -> 0<c -> (a/b)/c == a/(b*c).
intros a b c Hb Hc.
apply div_unique with (b*((a/b) mod c) + a mod b).
apply le_lt_trans with (b*((a/b) mod c) + b).
apply lt_le_trans with (b*((a/b) mod c) + b).
rewrite (div_mod a b) at 1 by order.
rewrite <- mul_assoc, <- mul_add_distr_l, mul_cancel_l by order.
Lemma rem_mul_r : forall a b c, b~=0 -> 0<c -> a mod (b*c) == a mod b + b*((a/b) mod c).
intros a b c Hb Hc.
rewrite <- div_mod by (apply neq_mul_0; split; order).
Lemma mod_div: forall a b, b~=0 -> a mod b / b == 0.
Theorem div_mul_le: forall a b c, 0<=a -> 0<b -> 0<=c -> c*(a/b) <= (c*a)/b.

command: intros b q1 q2 r1 r2 Hr1 Hr2 EQ.
destruct Hr1; destruct Hr2; try (intuition; order).
intros a b q r Hr EQ.
assert (Hb : b~=0) by (destruct Hr; intuition; order).
destruct (div_mod_unique b q (a/b) r (a mod b)); trivial.
destruct Hr; [left; apply mod_pos_bound|right; apply mod_neg_bound]; intuition order.
intros; apply div_unique with r; auto.
intros; apply div_unique with r; auto.
intros a b q r Hr EQ.
assert (Hb : b~=0) by (destruct Hr; intuition; order).
destruct (div_mod_unique b q (a/b) r (a mod b)); trivial.
destruct Hr; [left; apply mod_pos_bound|right; apply mod_neg_bound]; intuition order.
intros; apply mod_unique with q; auto.
intros; apply mod_unique with q; auto.
apply div_unique with (b - a mod b).
now rewrite <- H, opp_0, EQ, sgn_0.
apply mul_nonneg_nonneg; destruct (mod_pos_bound a b); order.
apply mul_nonpos_nonpos; destruct (mod_neg_bound a b); order.
intros; rewrite mod_eq, div_0_l; now nzsimpl.
rewrite mod_eq, div_1_r; nzsimpl; auto using sub_diag.
intro EQ; symmetry in EQ; revert EQ; apply lt_neq; apply lt_0_1.
rewrite (div_mod a b Hb), EQ; nzsimpl.
intros a b c Hc Hab.
rewrite (div_mod b c) at 1 by order.
rewrite (div_mod a b) at 2; try order.
rewrite (div_mod a b) at 1; try order.
rewrite (div_mod a b) at 1; try order.
rewrite mul_add_distr_l, add_shuffle0, <- div_mod by order.
rewrite mul_add_distr_l, add_shuffle0, <- div_mod by order.
rewrite (div_mod a b) at 1 by order.
rewrite <- mul_assoc, <- mul_add_distr_l, mul_cancel_l by order.
rewrite (div_mod a n) at 1 by order.
rewrite (div_mod a n) at 1 by order.
intros a b c Hb Hc.
apply div_unique with (b*((a/b) mod c) + a mod b).
apply le_lt_trans with (b*((a/b) mod c) + b).
apply lt_le_trans with (b*((a/b) mod c) + b).
rewrite (div_mod a b) at 1 by order.
rewrite <- mul_assoc, <- mul_add_distr_l, mul_cancel_l by order.
intros a b c Hb Hc.
rewrite <- div_mod by (apply neq_mul_0; split; order).
